aboutme: I live in Costa Rica, I am looking for freelance work with Elixir. I have plenty of full-time experience in full-stack (TypeScript) remote roles across multiple companies.
lsat_desc: Small website to showcase VegaLite graphs inside a Phoenix app. Uses a CSV as a data source, displays the percentile of median scores for different univeresities.
p1desc: A small project to showcase ReactJS with Typescript, TailwindCSS and Jest.
yinyang_description: A geometric animation created with C++ and the OpenFrameworks library. Try to imagine what it looks like before you open the link!
phoenix_blog_title: Sample blog app with Elixir + Phoenix
phoenix_blog_description: A small sample app about how to utilize Phoenix to create a list of posts with comments, you may see its usage inside the Github repository, includes GIFs.
technologies: Tools I like to work with
workdesc: If you have a position for me then shoot me a message in one of the platforms below.
